main event: Pilots of RC-97 and C-54 aircraft reported observing a stationary light that broke up into 4 separate lights and were seen maneuvering before finally extinguishing.
interesting points: The object displayed erratic movements and sometimes disappeared.
One pilot reported the object's movements were likely due to ground reflection caused by an inversion.
The object was observed from both ground and air.
The report includes inconclusive conclusions about the nature of the observed object, including that it could have been a balloon, aircraft, or an astronomical phenomenon.
sighted object: A stationary light that broke up into 4 separate lights
witnesses: Pilots of RC-97 and C-54 aircraft
